_header: Sith in waste nature no thing makes [Sen in waist natur na thinge mais]
_description: Verses advocating that everyone should labor — four couplets

CULKk15.First Lines:
Sen in waist natur na thinge maisand gud fore labor all men
                    hais…
CULKk15.Last Lines:
…Thar was neuer man fore na honourThat may excus hyme fra
                    lawbor
